doc.title: Juvenile Fire Department
doc.plot: Scene opens with little girl in night dress crying for help from second story window of play house. Six children, ranging in age from three to six, wearing fire hats, belts, boots, etc., respond with hook and ladder truck and proceed to put out the fire. The fire chief raises a ladder to the window and rescues baby doll and little girl, while the other firemen are carrying a great number of toys from the house. After they get the fire under control, they all enjoy themselves playing.
